extension.name: Emundus Conditional Redirect Plugin
extension.author: eMundus
extension.description: This plugin enables you to redirect applicants on specific condition

field.label: Condition PHP
field.desc: Si le code retourne false, alors l'utilisateur sera redirigé vers la page de redirection saisie
field.name: condition

field.label: URL
field.desc: URL sur laquelle rediriger si la condition renvoie false
field.name: redirection_url
field.query: SELECT jm.id, CONCAT(jmt.title, ' - ', jm.title) as label FROM jos_menu jm RIGHT JOIN jos_menu_types jmt on jm.menutype = jmt.menutype WHERE jm.published = 1 order by jm.menutype, jm.title

field.name: unimpacted_url
field.label: URL
field.query: SELECT jm.id, CONCAT(jmt.title, ' - ', jm.title) as label FROM jos_menu jm RIGHT JOIN jos_menu_types jmt on jm.menutype = jmt.menutype WHERE jm.published = 1 order by jm.menutype, jm.title
